content.text:
# Draft:EU chocolate war

When the European dispute ended over including fats in chocolate, Robert Linxe wrote that industrial chocolate manufacturers already included fats, but concealed the fact.
*
* https://agriculture.ec.europa.eu/document/download/f0702a80-a865-451e-a665-eebf4199c713_en?filename=ext-eval-chocolate-sum_2006_en.pdf
*
